item.title: 【Helpdesk】[TUTORIAL] How to download Weverse videos
item.description:
So, there was this Tumblr post about downloading Weverse videos, but it got taken down. Since the VLIVE downloader was taken down, here's a way to download Weverse content. All you need is a browser, that's it. It works on LIVE and non-paid content, but I cannot guarantee that this will work on paid content, because of how much Jelly I need to purchase just one video. (If anyone has a paid copy of a show, do it and DM me the results.)
Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: charlescanlom
